Effects: On hit, the target may only use attacks that target you or your allies for 1 min.

Name: Tea Time
Effects: Any target holding a Berry immediately consumes it.

Name: Techno Blast
Effects: Techno Blast’s type can be changed to Ice, Electric, Fire, or Water when used.

Name: Teeter Dance
Effects: On hit, all targets are Confused.

Name: Teleport
Effects: Teleport may be used as a Reaction. Teleport moves you 50ft away in your line of sight. After an enemy hits you with a move that deals damage, you may use Teleport as a Reaction to move up to 50ft away in your line of sight. You take only 1/4 th the damage you would have taken from the attack.

Name: Ten-Million Volt Thunderbolt
Effects: On hit, the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Terrain Pulse
Effects: If used if you are in the area of a Terrain move , Terrain Pulse has 5d8 for damage instead and its type changes to match the terrain.

Name: Thief
Effects: On hit, steals the target’s held item, if any.

Name: Thousand Arrows
Effects: Thousand Arrows ignores any Ground-type immunities.

Name: Thousand Waves
Effects: On hit, all targets are bound to the ground for 10 mins. Thousand Waves ignores any Ground-type immunities.

Name: Thrash
Effects: Move to and attack the nearest possible target within 25ft. During your next action, move to and attack the nearest possible target within 25ft, then you become Confused. Thrash can and will target allies if possible.

Name: Throat Chop
Effects: On hit, the target may not use attacks or abilities that require the use of the target’s voice.

Name: Thunder
Effects: Thunder has -2 during Accuracy Check unless it’s Raining. On hit, if you got 14 or higher on Accuracy Check, the targets are Paralyzed.

Name: Thunder Cage
Effects: On hit, all targets are bound to ground for 1d4 turns. For each turn the target is bound, it takes 1d6 damage.

Name: Thunder Fang
Effects: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is randomly either Stunned or Paralyzed.

Name: Thunder Punch
Effects: On hit, if you got 17 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Thunder Shock
Effects: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Thunder Wave
Effects: On hit, the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Thunderbolt
Effects: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Thunderous Kick
Effects: On hit, the target’s Defense is -1 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Tireless Teleport
Effects: Tireless Teleport can be used as a Reaction. If you are hit by an attack, move up to 50ft away in your line of sight. Take only 1/4 th the damage you would have taken from the attack.

Name: Toxic
Effects: Toxic has -3 during Accuracy Check, unless the user is Poison type. On hit, the target is Toxifies the target.

Name: Toxic Spikes
Effects: Place the Toxic Spikes Hazard in the area surrounding you. Toxic Spikes Hazard has the following ability: When a foe moves through Toxic Spikes Hazard during their turn and are on the ground, they are Poisoned. If the Toxic Spikes Hazard has multiple layers, it will Toxify foes instead of Poisoning them instead. This Hazard disappears after 2 mins.

Name: Toxic Thread
Effects: On hit, the target is Poisoned and the target’s Speed is -1 until they are no longer Poisoned.

Name: Transform
Effects: You transform into a copy of the target changing all of your stats except for HP. You copy its stats, skills, and passives. You can use any of the target’s moves. While transformed, you lose access to your regular moves, skills, passives, and biology. Except for stats, this information is not provided to you. Transform may not target Legendary Pokémon. Transform lasts for 2 hours or until Ditto chooses to change back as an action. Transform fails if used by anything but a Ditto.

Name: Tri Attack
Effects: On hit, if you got 17 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is randomly either Paralyzed, Burned, or Frozen.

Name: Trick
Effects: On hit, you and the target trade any held items. If only you or the target has an item, take or give the item to exchange who has possession of it.

Name: Trick Room
Effects: You create a circle of Tricky Terrain with a 60ft diameter. Within the Tricky terrain, turn orders are reversed during each round. If some are outside of Tricky terrain while others are within Tricky terrain, all actions are still made in reverse order. This terrain disappears after 2 mins.

Name: Trick-or-Treat
Effects: On hit, put a Treat Coat on the target. The Coat has the following ability: You gain the Ghost-type for 10 mins.

Name: Triple Axel
Effects: Triple Axel is a Scatter attack. Up to 3 attacks. Triple Axel’s last attack on hit deals an additional 1d12 damage.

Name: Triple Kick
Effects: Triple Kick is a Scatter attack. Up to 3 attacks. Triple Kick’s last attack on hit deals an additional 1d12 damage.

Name: Trop Kick
Effects: On hit, the target’s Attack is -1 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Twineedle
Effects: Twineedle is a Scat-ter attack. It has two attacks. On either hit, if you got 14 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Poisoned.

Name: Twinkle Tackle
Effects: Immediately move next to your target, then roll your accuracy check.

Name: Twister
Effects: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned.

Name: Unbreakable Armor
Effects: Your Defense is +4 for 10 mins, your Attack and Special Attack is -10 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Unbreakable Barrier
Effects: Your Special Defense is +4 for 10 mins, your Attack and Special Attack is -10 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Uproar
Effects: You may move, but then must use Uproar for two more consec-utive rounds. Sleeping Pokémon within range of Uproar are awoken and Pokémon cannot go to Sleep within Uproar’s range.

Name: V-Create
Effects: On hit, all targets are Burned.

Name: Vacuum Wave
Effects: Vacuum Wave has Priority.

Name: Venom Drench
Effects: Venom Drench can only target a Poisoned or Toxified enemy. On hit, the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are -3 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Venoshock
Effects: If the target is Poisoned or Toxified, Venoshock has 4d10 for damage instead.

Name: Vicious Insult
Effects: Unless you’ve spent at least 10 mins with the target, Vicious Insult has -4 during accuracy check. On hit, the target is stunned. On hit, during the target’s next 3 turns it must succeed a confidence check by rolling 11 or greater on 1d20+any one of their modifiers or be stunned again.

Name: Vital Throw
Effects: You can’t miss targets with less than 15 Defense if the target already acted this round. On hit, move the target away from you 15ft.

Name: Void Fury
Effects: On hit, your Defense and Special Defense is -2 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Volcanic Devastation
Effects: Volcanic Devastation counts as both a Water and Fire type move for effectiveness. When you use this attack you immediately end your turn. During your next turn, you can’t act. On the round after that, when it’s your turn roll Volcanic Devastation’s Accuracy Check and damage. Set your HP to -300% HP and you must make three death savings throws.

Name: Volt Tackle
Effects: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/3rd of the damage you deal and if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Wake-Up Slap
Effects: If Wake-Up Slap is used against a Sleeping target, Wake-Up Slap deals 5d8 for damage instead, then cures the target of Sleep. If you choose not to roll damage while using Wake-Up Slap, you do not need to roll an Accuracy Check.

Name: Water Pulse
Effects: On hit, if you got 16 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Confused.

Name: Water Shuriken
Effects: Water Shuriken has Priority and is a Scatter attack. Up to 5 attacks.

Name: Water Sport
Effects: Put a Water Coat on the target or yourself. The Coat has the following ability: Reduce damage from Fire attacks that hit you by 10. This Coat lasts for 2 mins.

Name: Water Spout
Effects: If you are at Max HP, Water Spout has 5d12 for damage instead.

Name: Waterfall
Effects: On hit, if you got 16 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned.

Name: Weather Ball
Effects: If within weather, Weather Ball has 5d8 for damage instead and its type changes to match the weather.

Name: Whirling Kinesis
Effects: On hit, the target’s Accuracy Checks are -3 during their next turn. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Whirlpool
Effects: On hit, the target is bound in place for 1d4 rounds. For each round the target is bound, it takes 1d4 special damage on its turns.

Name: Whirlwind
Effects: On hit, moves the target 60ft away.

Name: Wicked Blow
Effects: On hit, Wicked Blow always counts as a critical hit.

Name: Wild Charge
Effects: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/4th of the damage you deal.

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Effects: On hit, the target is Burned.

Name: Wish
Effects: Target an ally or yourself. After the target acts during the next round, they are healed HP equal to half of the target’s Max HP.

Name: Wonder Room
Effects: You create a circle of Wonderful Terrain with a 60ft diameter. Anyone who attacks within the Wonderful terrain makes Attack Accuracy Checks against Special Defense and Special Attack Accuracy Checks against Defense. This terrain disappears after 2 mins.

Name: Wood Hammer
Effects: On hit, you lose HP equal to 1/3rd of the damage you deal.

Name: Wrap
Effects: On hit, the target is bound to you for 1d4 rounds. For each round the target is bound, it takes 1d4 physical damage on its turns.

Name: Yawn
Effects: On hit, the target falls Asleep after its next turn.

Name: Zap Cannon
Effects: Zap Cannon has -6 during Accuracy Check. On hit the target is Paralyzed.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Effects: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned.

Name: Zing Zap
Effects: On hit, if you got 18 or higher on Accuracy Check, the target is Stunned.

Name: Psionic Fury
Effects: On hit, your Defense and Special Defense is -2 for 10 mins. This effect cannot be stacked.
